title: S13 Ep74: The Hunt for Lake Monsters: Chasing Champ
itunes:title: The Hunt for Lake Monsters: Chasing Champ
description:
BEYOND the DARKNESS is on The Hunt for Lake Monsters: Chasing Champ with guest Katy Elizabeth.

For centuries a creature has been sighted in Lake Champlain. Native American Tribes whisper about the aquatic creature, famous photos have remained a point of speculation and thousands of sightings have been seen and reported through the years. Our guest Katy Elizabeth has been researching this beastie for years and has even helped pass a law to protect Champ!

Today Katy shares the history and her own encounters!

Visit her site here: officialchampsearch.webs.com

Follow the research page on FB: https://www.facebook.com/Champ-Search-355921967855350/

Get her book here: www.Amazon.com/shop/darknessradio
